skill.name: docker-helper
skill.description: Docker Compose generation, optimization, and troubleshooting assistance.
skill.summary: Docker Compose generation, optimization, and troubleshooting assistance.
skill.author: CuriousLearner

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only documentation and instructions for Docker best practices. No executable code, network calls, file system access, or external commands are present.

content.value_statement: Creating Docker configurations takes time and expertise. This skill provides ready-to-use templates, optimization techniques, and troubleshooting guidance for containerized applications.
actual_capabilities: Generate Dockerfiles for Node.js, Python, and Go applications
Create docker-compose.yml files for multi-service architectures
Optimize image sizes using multi-stage builds and layer caching
Troubleshoot container startup, networking, and volume issues
Apply security best practices including non-root users and minimal images
Configure health checks and resource limits for production deployments
limitations: Does not execute Docker commands on your system
Does not access or modify existing Docker configurations
Does not provide real-time container monitoring
Cannot deploy containers to cloud services directly

use_cases.title: Containerize applications
use_cases.description: Generate production-ready Dockerfiles for your applications with security and performance best practices.

use_cases.title: Optimize build pipelines
use_cases.description: Reduce build times and image sizes using multi-stage builds, caching strategies, and BuildKit optimizations.

use_cases.title: Standardize configurations
use_cases.description: Create consistent Docker standards across your team with documented best practices and templates.

prompt_templates.title: Generate Dockerfile
prompt_templates.scenario: Create a Dockerfile for a Node.js application
prompt_templates.prompt: @docker-helper Generate a multi-stage Dockerfile for a Node.js 18 application with TypeScript. Include production optimizations and security best practices.

prompt_templates.title: Create compose file
prompt_templates.prompt: @docker-helper Create a docker-compose.yml for a development environment with a React frontend, Node.js backend, and PostgreSQL database.

prompt_templates.title: Optimize existing setup
prompt_templates.prompt: @docker-helper Optimize this Docker setup for faster builds and smaller image size. Current base image is node:18, and build takes 5 minutes.

prompt_templates.title: Debug container issues
prompt_templates.prompt: @docker-helper My container exits immediately after starting with no error output. How do I troubleshoot this container startup issue?

output_examples.input: @docker-helper Generate a secure Dockerfile for a Python Flask API
output: ‚úì Multi-stage build for minimal image size (~150MB)
‚úì Python 3.11-slim base with latest security patches
‚úì No secrets stored in image layers
‚úì Requirements installed in separate layer for caching

best_practices: Use multi-stage builds to separate build dependencies from runtime
Always run containers as non-root users to limit security risks
Implement health checks for critical services to enable proper orchestration
anti_patterns: Do not use 'latest' tag for base images in production
Do not store secrets or credentials in Dockerfiles or image layers
Do not run COPY . . early in Dockerfile as it invalidates cache on every change

faq.question: What programming languages does this skill support?
faq.answer: Python, Node.js, Go, Java, Ruby, and any language with a Dockerfile base image.

faq.question: What are the image size limits?
faq.answer: This skill provides guidance only. Actual limits depend on your Docker host and registry.

faq.question: Does this skill integrate with Docker Desktop?
faq.answer: No. The skill generates configurations that you apply using your own Docker installation.

faq.question: Is my code safe when using this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only generates text. Your code never leaves your local environment.

faq.question: Why is my container failing to start?
faq.answer: Common causes include missing dependencies, port conflicts, permission issues, or incorrect entrypoint commands.

faq.question: How is this different from Docker Compose CLI?
faq.answer: The skill generates configurations. The Docker Compose CLI executes them. Use both together for container workflows.
